trans-unit.source: Provides a unified way of converting types of values to other types, as well as for accessing standard values and subproperties.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma forma de conversão de tipos de valores de outros tipos, bem como para aceder aos valores padrão e subproperties unificada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.TableLayoutSettingsTypeConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.TableLayoutSettingsTypeConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to the native type of this converter.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este conversor pode converter um objeto no tipo de origem especificada para o tipo nativo deste conversor.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de que pretende converter de.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este conversor pode efetuar a conversão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type by using the context.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se este conversor pode converter um objeto para o tipo de destino especificado utilizando o contexto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de que pretende converter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este conversor pode efetuar a conversão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to the type of this converter by using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto fornecido para o tipo deste conversor utilizando as informações de cultura e contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para utilizar como a cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>converter.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor convertido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to the specified type by using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto do valor indicado para o tipo especificado, utilizando as informações de cultura e contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para utilizar como a cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>converter.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>para converter o parâmetro de valor para.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor convertido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: destinationType is .
trans-unit.target: destinationTypeis .
